thread.title: On Gotham, Paul Reubens Will Reprise His Batman Returns Role As Penguin’s Dad

title: On Gotham, Paul Reubens Will Reprise His Batman Returns Role As Penguin’s Dad
text:
On Gotham, Paul Reubens Will Reprise His Batman Returns Role As Penguin’s Dad 
Published By: Geekosystem - Today 
Penguin's never had a father figure on Gotham before, although he does have an unforgettable mother (played by Carol Kane). We'll now finall...
